feed.title: Bitmagnet Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Bitmagnet: v0.9.2
entry.content:
Some users have reported a slowdown in the app that is probably due to the 0.9.0 reindex. Adding a configuration option to dial down the queue concurrency for torrent processing.

If you're affected, try setting the value to 1, either as an environment variable, e.g. PROCESSOR_CONCURRENCY=1, or in your config file:

yaml processor: concurrency: 1

What's Changed

  • Allow configuring processor concurrency by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/281

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/compare/v0.9.1...v0.9.2

entry.title: New release for Bitmagnet: v0.9.3
entry.content:
This release reduces the default processor.concurrency config to 1 following user feedback that concurrency of 3 causes slowdowns on some systems. If your system can handle it, you may want to configure a higher value.

What's Changed

  • Default processor.concurrency to 1 by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/284

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/compare/v0.9.2...v0.9.3

entry.title: New release for Bitmagnet: v0.9.4
entry.content:
This release includes 2 optimizations that should reduce the load that queue jobs place on the database, including for the 0.9.0 upgrade job.

It should also reduce instances of ERROR: canceling statement due to user request in the Postgres logs, but note that Bitmagnet does cancel some database queries because it sometimes tries 2 query strategies in a race and cancels the slowest one, so this message doesn't indicate a problem.

What's Changed

  • Add local_search_enabled flag to classifier by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/291
  • Reduce CTE strategy usage when not needed by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/292

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/compare/v0.9.3...v0.9.4

entry.title: New release for Bitmagnet: v0.9.5
entry.content:
Allow rate limit "burst" for TMDB API when using the default API key, allowing the limit to average to 1 second with a lot less blocking, which became more important as the default queue concurrency was reduced to 1.

What's Changed

  • Increase rate limit burst when using default TMDB API key by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/296

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/compare/v0.9.4...v0.9.5

entry.title: New release for Bitmagnet: v0.10.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Translations
  • Themes
  • Responsive mobile-friendly UI
  • Permalinks
  • Health check within web UI
  • Monitoring dashboard
  • Queue management within UI
  • Allow bulk-copying of magnet links and info hashes
  • Separation of torrent files query from main search query, and pagination through files in a torrent
  • add queue jobs metric in grafana by @scratchmex in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/297
  • Webui revamp by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/280
  • Specify go 1.23 in actions by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/317
  • Upgrade go libs by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/318
  • Fix duplicate key error for queue jobs by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/319
  • Fix non-terminating help by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/320
  • Add 10 seconds grace period for Postgres to become available by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/321
  • Postgres DSN by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/322
  • Update docker compose example by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/323
  • Allow specifying EXTRA_CONFIG_FILES by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/324
  • Add tooltip for decimal filesize by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/325
  • Remove broken bootstrap nodes by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/326
  • Deprioritize retried jobs by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/327
  • Fix duplicate key error by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/338
  • Upgrade go in flake.nix by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/339
  • Fixes v0.10.0 by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/340
  • Add not found page by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/341
  • Fix budgeted_count subquery by @gileri in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/333
  • Local search and tmdb search should return match with lowest distance by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/342
  • Update docker-compose example gluetun configuration by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/343
  • Rename core classifier by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/344
  • Queue admin improvements by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/350
  • Update classifier core config file by @emmanuel-ferdman in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/345
  • i18n across labels in torrent bulk actions by @rraymondgh in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/346
  • Update fr.json by @cyberbabacool in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/351
  • Add page titles by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/355
  • Miscellaneous fixes by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/357
  • dashboard - purge queues labels wrong for statuses by @rraymondgh in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/356
  • Housekeeping by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/366
  • Improve file type detection in classifier by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/365
  • torznab - fix incorrect leechers in arrs by @rraymondgh in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/372
  • chore: Update docker-compose.yml by @dashed in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/370
  • Allow slice values in configuration by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/374
  • Fix search params by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/380
  • Chart improvements by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/381
  • Housekeeping by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/382
  • Upgrade Go to 1.23.6 by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/383
  • Allow ad hoc reprocessing via API and web UI by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/393
  • Adjust translation for "dismiss" by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/394
  • torznab - return tv shows and movies from parent category where it was requested along with subcategories by @rraymondgh in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/387
  • torznab tmdbid in results. by @rraymondgh in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/386
  • Docsite updates by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/364
  • Add code of conduct by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/395
  • fix charts clipped on small devices by @rraymondgh in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/385

New Contributors

  • @scratchmex made their first contribution in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/297
  • @gileri made their first contribution in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/333
  • @emmanuel-ferdman made their first contribution in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/345
  • @cyberbabacool made their first contribution in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/351
  • @dashed made their first contribution in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/370

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/compare/v0.9.5...v0.10.0
